title: Stormlord Rising
description: The second book in this gripping series of a deadly battle ... who will control the water?Shale Flint is forced to help the devious rainlord, taquar Sardonyx, in his quest to create rain - even though taquar's lust for power threatens to consume all that stands in his path. terelle leaves the Scarpen with her great-grandfather, Russet ... his painting of her future has trapped her into doing his will. Obsessed with regaining his status as a Watergiver lord in his homeland, it seems that Russet will go to any lengths to attain his goal. Meanwhile, Ryka Feldspar has been captured and taken as a concubine by a Reduner tribemaster. Desperate to escape, she discovers her Rainlord husband, Kaneth, in the slave lines ... but, to Ryka's despair, he has no memories of their time together.
author: Glenda Larke
